entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add environment capability to UserSecrets (secrets.json) #99565
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BufferBlock - Memory leak on OutputAvailableAsync #99564
  • [wasm] broad regressions in vector performance under interpreter #99554
  • [wasm] Compiled regexes in interpreter ~25-50x regression #99553
  • JIT_NewS_MP_FastPortable is slow for Orchard CMS benchmark on Linux-arm64 #99552
  • Assertion failed 'addrClone != nullptr' #99551
  • [browser][ws] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99545
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #99543
  • Null dereference in forward subtitution #99540
  • WASM: Assembly search path should be relative to the blazor.boot.json, not the importing module. #99539
  • Inconsistent handling of duplicate keys in INI configuration files #99535
  • `DiagnosticListener` disposal does not remove existing subscriptions #99523
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #99521
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Assertion failed: 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) #99520
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Some tests deadlock without -backgroundExec #99519
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed in SafeFileHandle.OverlappedValueTaskSource.IOCallback #99517
  • Support control flow guard on x86 Windows #99516
    Future
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] Force short date pattern to use yyyy #99515
  • [MONO][Wasm] Potential function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #99514
  • [API Proposal]: Generic MemberwiseClone<T> #99510

Closed

  • [System.Reflection.Emit] AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndCollect not collecting assemblies #99559
  • Incorrect value returned by `Environment.ProcessorCount` when running on GCP Cloud Run resulting in memory problems. #99046
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT SOS debugging on MacOS isn't working #99503
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Xml.XPath to support XPath 3.1 and their XSLT variants #99544
  • Transactional File Manager #99498
  • ValidationContext doesn't support GetKeyedService() method. #97019
  • Avoid generating degenerate flow during redundant branch optimization #48609
    Future
  • [mono] Missing box optimizations in the interpreter #99463
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in CalendarTestBase.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing affecting several globalization tests #99378
  • [browser][MT] Depleted pthreadPoolSize #97913
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests.NamedMutex_ThreadExitDisposeRaceTest #97968
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] JsImportTaskEchoPendingResult fails #98035
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ThreadingTimer #98216
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: Invalid typed array length #98217
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskAwaitPendingResult #98219
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting #98830
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonDerivedTypeAttribute<T> for simplified polymorphic JSON configuration #99421
  • [API Proposal]: Support JsonCommentHandling.Allow in JsonNode #98865
  • Call to gc_heap::create_bgc_thread hanging #96984
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Got Dependency Error #97442
  • Question: zip file hash digest calculation #99518
  • [HTTP/2] Reading data assert #99494
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.18
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold const index access for static readonly string #99562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add fgRedirectTrueEdge, fgRedirectFalseEdge #99561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for Alpine 3.19 / 3.20 #99560
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Disable jiterp safepoints in single-threaded WASM #99558
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix mustExpand check to account for inlining #99557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `m_srcUseLclFld` and `m_dstUseLclFld` #99556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't inline methods with the DoesNotReturn attribute in interp #99550
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve precision of the vectorized trig functions #99549
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add a parent check to the forward substitution tree walk #99546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • JIT: more likelihood checking #99541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use existing Range vectorized fill in Enumerable.OrderBy #99538
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add enums to Enumerable.Order implicitly stable check #99533
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Fix: resources leak in ActiveDirectorySchemaClass in GetPropertyValuesRecursively #99526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Update boot.json manifest generation order #99525
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] drop managed keepalive from thread pool #99524
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] WS cancelation fix #99522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add a new GC handle and use it to simplify NativeAOT corelib #99512
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BV_2B #99534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BS_1A, BT_1A #99458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup ifdefs #99511
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99508
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Fix usage of recycled lists in the thread pool #99387
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.29
  • Always display statement information #99531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99375
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99376
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-staging] Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98873
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono][jit] Optimize JIT time on platforms without SIMD support. #99485
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99472
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove ref assembly code from CodeQL scans #99469
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix overaggressive switch optimization in regex source generator #99431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: don't create degenerate flow in `fgReplaceJumpTarget` #99509
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][bench] Check for the muteErrors presence #99536
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating linker range extension thunks #99208
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Guard against non-sensical ReadyToRunGenericHelperNode #99513
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Http/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame #99502
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser][MT] fix various issues and enable System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable most SDL-required C/C++ warnings #99470
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix negative lookaround stack handling #99424
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.30
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.5
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure edge likelihoods 3 #99460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Where is .NET SDK 5.0.416? The latest download is 5.0.408. #39409
  • Private dependencies appear in an app's deps.json file #39400

Closed

  • ContainerArchiveOutputPath is not effecive on new .NET 8 container support while running on Framework #36651
  • A new option to allow dotnet tool install should return exit code 0 if tool is already installed #10310
    Discussion
  • Support for codespaces #21299

PullRequests

Created

  • Watch UI #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0.2xx] make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39267
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Enhance base image inference for trimmed applications - use -extras when globalization is in use #39317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

Merged

  • Create dictionary-expressions.md #7995

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename silently fails when "Rename symbol's file" is selected #72489
  • csharp_prefer_brace not working with 17.9 #72488
  • Broken syntax highlighting for local variables C# #72487
  • VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider: occuring error messsage for tuple contruct #72486
  • Find References doesn't work when a class contains #line hidden directives #72485
  • Generate constructor fails when type contains a parameterless primary constructor #72484
  • 'if' semantic snippet does not honor non-default brace placement at end of line #72481
    Backlog

Closed

  • Incorrect indentation of list pattern cases in switch expressions #72465
  • Invalid "Collection initialization can be simplified" #72483
  • Referencing a project that uses a Source Generator results in Source Generator running twice #59725
    Backlog
  • [InlineArray] on a ref struct reports CS0306 as error, but CS9184 as a warning #72467

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix logic in compilation tracker causing an assert #72492
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Catch connection lost exceptions from shutting down while refresh req… #72491
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove workspace option #72490
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce closure allocations associated with AsyncLazy usage #72449
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Do not generate async write in `cw` snippet #72477
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use AsyncBatchingWorkQueue instead of TaskQueue #72425
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Move to scout queue #72493
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP] Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • DefiniteAssignment: allow unconverted object creation expressions within bad expressions #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update VS SDK to 17.10.22-preview-1 #72359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't run _CopyPackagesToInsert on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform fewer operations on the ImmutableDictionary held onto by FilePathToDocumentIdsMap #72476
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error generating https certificate on macOS Sonoma 14.4 #54491
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction #54481
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #54480
  • How I can implement distributed session using redis in a blazor web app? #54477

Closed

  • Minimal API does not return ProblemDetails traceid on Exception #54325
    Backlog
  • InputFile OnChange does not work properly #53638
  • VS 2022 17.10.0 Preview 1 - ClaimsPrincipal FindFirst method always returns null #54302
  • Any plans for Managed Identity authentication for Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis? #54414
  • Issue when adding Blazor (server) to existing MVC app in .NET 8 #54438
  • Cannot trigger blazor events with elements #54423
  • [Blazor] Way to run the E2E tests against the multithreaded runtime #53435
    9.0-preview3
  • Add IsComposing Property to KeyboardEventArgs #54456
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #54467
  • Perf regression: single_query #54475
  • instruction #54312
  • InvalidToken when confirming email change #54173

PullRequests

Created

  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24161.2 #54483
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add test for route analyzer performance issue #54479
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Create ci-public.yml #54442
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/7.0] Create ci-public.yml #54441
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.18
  • [release/8.0] Create ci-public.yml #54440
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • Create ci-public.yml #54439
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • fixes minimal apis not returning traceid on problem details upon exceptions #54478
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix `OpenApiGenerator.GetOpenApiOperation()` method inline docs #54470
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview3
  • Ability to run E2E tests on WebAssembly multithreaded runtime #54351
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview3
  • Add IsComposing Property to KeyboardEventArgs Classes #54457
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • backport 8.0 - http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54437
    Servicing-approved, feature-httpsys
  • Fallback to `IActivator.CreateInstance<IXmlDecryptor>` when `Type.GetType` fails #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.29
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Use the VMR commit hash in .version #54461
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-counters truncates attributes too aggresively #4170
    8.0.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CollectionView item cells do not resize when the content size is changed #21141
  • Unable to create XUnit Project referencing .NET 8 MAUI #21138
  • NavigationPage shows title bar before navigating #21134
  • DisplayPromptAsync not working in iOS 17.4 #21131
  • Infinite ANR loop in MAUI UI with Android 13 #21130
  • HttpClient(AndroidMessageHandler) with NTLM v2 auth and Self Signed Certificate returns 401 Unauthorized #21128
  • Flyout menu overlaps with title bar since .Net8 #21127

Closed

  • ImageButton Padding & Ripple effect stops working with .NET 8 #18857
  • SearchBar crashes App on IOS by click on it to type #21139
  • iOS - Shell - SetTabBarIsVisible does not resize the page to take up the space left by the tab bar #21135
  • Unexpected UI Disruption Upon Invoking .Focus() Method on DatePicker and TimePicker Controls with IsVisible Set to False #20380
  • AOT + Trim - Could not resolve type with token 01000005 from typeref #21082
  • Please add Combo Box to .Net Maui #21111
  • Documentation is wrong/missing: How to upload MAUI app to Google Play Store? #21132
  • [regression/8.0.3] MauiImage Build action not working properly #18765
  • can not set Grid.Column to NavigationPage? #21114
  • OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast() iOS/MacCatalyst mismatch makes it impossible to guard some features #21106
  • OnNavigatedTo/OnNavigatedFrom cannot access args.DestinationPage/args.PreviousPage #21123
  • Xamalicious malware in Maui!? #21117
  • PKPass Initialization crashes on iOS 17.4 #21115
  • PlatformImage.FromStream not loading image #21126

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Round item size in GridView #21142
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iSS] Fix ui loop #21140

Merged

  • [Trimming] Fix ILLink warnings in source generated code #21054
    area/Xaml </>
  • Stable branding for SR3 #21137
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update Sdk and installer #21107
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Fix Image not rendering in Mac Idiom (Device family = 6) Button #21048
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, control-button
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Add Helpers to aide Debugging MSBuild tasks #20695
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate fails when assigning a bool based on Any() #33290
  • Manipulating Model (get/find/update/add) by string name #33289
  • Joining Table is not getting updated through EF Core #33288
  • Add IConventionEntityTypeBuilder API for UseSqlReturningClause #33287
    9.0.0
  • Migrations creates extra keys and indexes #33283

Closed

  • Issue with bulk insert entities #33285
  • Remove rogue execution from query tests #33280

PullRequests

Created

  • Forcibly sets "en-US" locale. #33291

Merged

  • Tiny simplification in funcletizer #33284
    auto-merge
  • Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33276
  • Update tsaoptions.json for EF/Data notifications to new alias #33273
  • Update MSBuild dependencies #33275
  • Stop doing rogue execution in query tests #33281

Updated

  • Revert "Scaffolding Change -d option to -m, since -d no longer works (#32606)" #33282
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.36.0 to 3.38.1 #33238
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18972
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18971
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #18970
  • Remove SBE license entry from baseline #18968
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18960
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18959
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18958
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18957
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18956
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18955
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #18954
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #18947

Merged

  • Set the CrossBuild property instead of the CROSSCOMPILE environment variable #18915
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18112
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.29
  • Revert "Rebootstrap SB SDK/artifacts" #18964

Updated

  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #18941
  • Binary tooling #18726
  • Enable publishing in VMR #18917
